member.name: T:NMatrix.Core.Collections.SortedDuplicateKey
member.summary: Provides an IComparable implementation for use in sorted lists which need duplicate keys.
member.remarks: See the IComparable.CompareTo method implementaion for details of the comparing mechanism.

member.name: F:NMatrix.Core.Collections.SortedDuplicateKey._order
member.summary: Keep the order value.

member.name: M:NMatrix.Core.Collections.SortedDuplicateKey.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a key with the specified order.

member.name: M:NMatrix.Core.Collections.SortedDuplicateKey.System#IComparable#CompareTo(System.Object)
member.summary: Implements IComparable interface, for use by a sorted list.
member.remarks: If the passed order is int.MaxValue, is equal or is greater than this instance order, we return -1. If the passed order is zero or less than this instance order, we return +1. We don't return 0 (equal) for any value to allow duplicate keys in the list. The drawback is that if we try to access the sorted list by index or key, an exception will be thrown, as no match will be found. The list can only be enumerated.

member.name: P:NMatrix.Core.Collections.SortedDuplicateKey.Order
member.summary: The key's order.

member.name: T:NMatrix.Core.Patterns.HostedVisitor
member.summary: A visitor hosted in the generator environment.

member.name: T:NMatrix.Core.Patterns.Visitor
member.summary: Abstract base class for visitors. Descendents implement only the Visit methods for the types it wants to catch and leave the rest to this method.
member.remarks: The method uses reflection to call the most appropiate method it one is found. Else it does nothing. The pattern is implemented using method overloading which adds the flexibility exposed.

member.name: T:NMatrix.Core.Patterns.IVisitor
member.summary: The visitor interface implemented by descendents using visitable objects implementing the visitor pattern. Implements a single method, Visit.

member.name: M:NMatrix.Core.Patterns.IVisitor.Visit(System.Object)
member.summary: See Visitor design pattern.

member.name: M:NMatrix.Core.Patterns.Visitor.Visit(System.Object)
member.summary: See Visitor design pattern.

member.summary: Provides descendent classes access to the service provider.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.summary: Initializes the component passing the environment host variable.

member.summary: The interface for visitable objects in the visitor pattern. Implements only one method, Accept.

member.summary: See Visitor design pattern.

member.summary: Default constructor.

member.summary: Abstract base class for visitable classes.
